translation: 3. Looking at the chart, you can see that the number of customers remained constant during the entire second quarter.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Tabela zawiera informacje o procencie aktywnych użytkowników.
english: The table provides information on the percentage of active users.
glossary: to provide information on sth
translation: 4. The table includes information about the percentage of active users.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Wykres ilustruje gwałtowny spadek cen akcji po wybuchu wojny.
english: The graph illustrates a sharp fall in stock prices after the war broke out.
glossary: to illustrate sth/to break out
translation: 5. The chart illustrates the rapid decrease in stock prices after the outbreak of war.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Ceny ropy gwałtownie spadły po ogłoszeniu.
english: Oil prices plummeted after the announcement.
glossary: to plummet
translation: 6. Oil prices plunged after the announcement.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Analitycy uważają, że cena złota się ustabilizuje.
english: Analysts believe that the gold price will level off.
glossary: to level off
translation: 7. The analysts believe that the gold price will stabilize.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Ceny żywności w Polsce gwałtownie spadły w pierwszym kwartale tego roku.
english: Food prices in Poland plunged in the first quarter of this year.
glossary: to plunge
translation: 8. Food prices in Poland plunged in the first quarter of this year

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Ceny surowców drastycznie wzrosły w tym tygodniu.
english: Raw material prices have drastically gone up this week.
glossary: to go up drastically
translation: 9. Commodity prices have soared this week.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Wskaźnik przestępczości w Polsce spadł w ubiegłym roku o dziesięć procent.
english: The crime rate in Poland dropped by ten percent last year.
glossary: to drop
translation: 10. The crime rate in Poland decreased by ten percent last year.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Zrobiłaś test ciążowy?
english: Did you do a pregnancy test?
glossary: to do a pregnancy test/a pregnancy test
translation: Have you done a pregnancy test?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Ilu wspólników było na spotkaniu w zeszłym tygodniu?
english: How many business partners were there at the meeting last week?
glossary: a participant/a meeting/last week
translation: How many partners did attend the meeting last week?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Na co się patrzysz?
english: What are you looking at?
glossary: to look at sth
translation: What are you looking at?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nauczycielka zasugerowała, żebym poszła na studia.
english: My teacher suggested that I go to college.
glossary: to suggest that.../a teacher/to go to college
translation: The teacher suggested I would go to college.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Na kogo masz zamiar głosować?
english: Who are you going to vote for?
glossary: to vote for sb/to be going to do sth
translation: Who are you going to vote for?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Rzecznik policji potwierdził, że złodziej został zatrzymany.
english: A police spokesperson confirmed that the thief had been detained.
glossary: a police spokesperson/to confirm sth/a thief/to detain sb
translation: The police spokeperson confirmed the robber had been arrested.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Oglądamy dzisiaj wieczorem mecz. Wpadnij.
english: We're watching a match tonight. Drop by.
glossary: to watch a match/to drop by
translation: We're watching a match tonight. Drop by.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Może nie byłbyś marudny, gdybyś nie siedział codziennie przed telewizorem.
english: Maybe you wouldn't be moody if you didn't sit in front of the TV every day.
glossary: to be moody/to sit in front of the TV/every day
translation: Maybe you wouldn't be moody if you hadn't sit in front of TV every day.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Muszę się skupić na szukaniu lepszej pracy.
english: I have to focus on looking for a better job.
glossary: to look for a job/to focus on sth
translation: I have to focus on looking for the better job.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jeszcze tego nie przemyślałem.
english: I haven't thought it over yet.
glossary: to think sth over
translation: I haven't thought it over yet.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Policja przyjechała na miejsce zbrodni po tym, jak właściciel sklepu zastrzelił złodzieja.
english: The police came to the crime scene after the store owner had shot down a thief.
glossary: to come to a crime scene/to shoot sb down/a store owner/a thief
translation: 1. The police came to the crime scene after the store owner had shot the thief dead.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Na szczęscie syn przyzwyczaił się do wynoszenia śmieci.
english: Fortunately, my son got used to taking out the garbage.
glossary: Fortunately.../a son/to take out the garbage
translation: 2. Fortunately, our son got used to taking out the garbage.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Rodzice pytali mnie, dlaczego chcesz rzucić studia.
english: My parents asked me why you wanted to drop out of college.
glossary: to drop out of college
translation: 3. The parents asked me why do you want to drop out of college.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Powiedziałem ci, że przyprawy uwydatnią smak potrawy.
english: I told you the spices would bring out the flavor of the dish.
glossary: to bring out the flavor/a dish/spices
translation: 4. I told you that the spices will bring out the flavor of the dish.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Dlaczego bierzesz pożyczkę?
english: Why are you taking out a loan?
glossary: to take out a loan
translation: 5. Why are you taking out a loan?

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Wykład by się nie ciągnął, gdybyś nie zadawał głupich pytań.
english: The lecture wouldn't have dragged on if you hadn't asked stupid questions.
glossary: to ask stupid questions/to drag on/a lecture
translation: 6. The lecture wouldn't have dragged on if you hadn't asked stupid questions.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Samolot odlatywał, kiedy pojawiliśmy się na lotnisku.
english: The plane was taking off when we showed up at the airport.
glossary: to take off/to show up at the airport
translation: 7. The plane was taking off when we showed up at the airport.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Nie chciałbym, żebyś popadł w uzależnienie.
english: I wouldn't like you to fall into addiction.
glossary: to fall into addiction
translation: 8. I wouldn't want you to fall into addiction.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Zarząd mnie pytał, dlaczego zmiany nie przyniosły sukcesu.
english: The management board asked me why the changes hadn't brought about success.
glossary: to bring about success/the management board/a change
translation: 9. The management  board asked me why the changes hadn't brought about success.

name: Margaret Usher
polish: Wydrukowałem już wypracowanie.
english: I've already printed out the essay.
glossary: to print out an essay
translation: 10. I have already printed out the essay.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Miałem nadzieję, że nic nie będę musiał dzisiaj robić.
english: I hoped I wouldn't have to do anything today.
glossary: to hope/today
translation: I hoped I wouldn't do anything today.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Czy jest tu ktoś zainteresowany tym tematem?
english: Is there anyone here interested in the subject?
glossary: to be interested in a subject
translation: Are you there someone interesting the subject?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie powinieneś był wspominać o naszych problemach na spotkaniu z szefem.
english: You shouldn't have mentioned our problems at the meeting with the boss.
glossary: at the meeting/to mention sth
translation: You shouldn't have mentioned our problems at the meeting with your supervisor.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie zjedliśmy wczoraj kolacji w restauracji, ponieważ mój mąż zapomniał zarezerwować stolik.
english: We didn't have dinner at the restaurant yesterday because my husband had forgotten to book a table.
glossary: to forget to do sth/to book a table/a husband/to eat dinner; to have dinner/at the restaurant
translation: We didn't have dinner at the restaurant yesterday because my husband had forgotten to book the table.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Pójdziemy na kawę, jak już będzie ładna pogoda.
english: We'll go for a coffee once the weather is good.
glossary: to go for a coffee/the weather
translation: We'll go for a coffee once the wheather is good.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Niestety mój szef został zwolniony, zanim zdążył mi dać podwyżkę.
english: Unfortunately, my boss had been fired before he managed to give me a pay-raise.
glossary: to give sb a pay-raise/a boss/to be fired/Unfortunately...
translation: Unfortunately, my supervisor was fired before he had given me a pay-raise.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Kiedy zdałaś sobie sprawę, że zostałaś oszukana?
english: When did you realize you'd been cheated?
glossary: to realize sth/to cheat sb
translation: When did you realize you had been cheaten?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Zamówiłbym teraz frytki, gdybym nie był najedzony.
english: I'd order French fries now if I weren't full.
glossary: to order French fries/to be full
translation: I'd order french fries if I wasn't full.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie ma takiej zasady.
english: There's no such rule.
glossary: a rule
translation: There isn't such a rule.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Rodzice się mnie pytali, czy wziąłem w końcu kredyt.
english: My parents asked me if I'd finally taken out a loan.
glossary: to take out a loan/finally
translation: My parents asked me if I took a bribe finally.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Dam Ci znać, jak już skończę pracę.
english: I'll let you know once I finish work.
glossary: to let sb know/to finish work
translation: I'll let you know once I finish my job.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Gdyby linia montażowa nie została wczoraj naprawiona, nie bylibyśmy teraz w stanie dostarczyć towaru na czas.
english: If the assembly line hadn't been fixed yesterday, we wouldn't be able to deliver the goods on time now.
glossary: the assembly line/to fix sth/to deliver the goods/to be able to do sth/on time
translation: If the assembly line wasn't finished yesterday, we wouldn't be able to deliver articles on time.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Mogłaś mnie wczoraj odwiedzić, skoro byłaś w mieście.
english: You could've visited me yesterday since you were in town.
glossary: to visit sb/to be in town
translation: You could visit me yesterday wile you were in town.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Przez trzy miesiące w liceum pracowałam jako kelnerka.
english: I worked as a waitress for three months in high school.
glossary: to work as a waitress/in high school
translation: I'd been working as a waitress in high school for three months.

name: Anna Patton
polish: W tym miesiącu jest kilkoro nowych klientów.
english: There are a few new clients this month.
glossary: a client/this month
translation: There are a few new clients this month.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Powinienem był się ciebie pozbyć, zanim narobiłeś problemów.
english: I should've gotten rid of you before you made trouble.
glossary: to get rid of sb/to make trouble
translation: I should've gotten rid of you before you had made problems.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Gdybym przeszła teraz na emeryturę, musiałabym codziennie siedzieć sama w domu.
english: If I retired now, I'd have to sit at home alone every day.
glossary: to retire/to sit at home
translation: If I had go retirement now, I'd have sit at home every day.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie powinnaś była składać obietnicy, jeśli wiedziałaś, że jej nie dotrzymasz.
english: You shouldn't have made the promise if you knew you wouldn't keep it.
glossary: to make a promise/to keep a promise
translation: You shouldn't have made a promiss if you know you wouldn't keep it.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Wczoraj marzyłam tylko o zrobieniu sobie drzemki.
english: I only dreamed of taking a nap yesterday.
glossary: to take a nap/to dream of sth
translation: I dreamed of making a nap yesterday.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie powinieneś był opowiadać tego żartu. Był niegrzeczny.
english: You shouldn't have told the joke. It was rude.
glossary: to be rude to sb/to tell sb a joke
translation: I shouldn't have told a joke. It was rude.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Ile osadzonych jest obecnie w tym więzieniu?
english: How many inmates are there currently in the jail?
glossary: a jail; a prison/an inmate/currently
translation: How many inmates are in the prison curently?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Kilka tygodni temu dowiedziałem się, że moja żona była już raz mężatką.
english: I found out a few weeks ago that my wife had already been married once.
glossary: to be married/to find sth out/a few weeks ago/a wife
translation: I found out a few weeks ago my wife had already been married once.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Śnił ci się wczoraj koszmar?
english: Did you have a bad dream yesterday?
glossary: to have a bad dream
translation: Did you have a nightmare yesterday?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Dzwoniłbym do ciebie częściej, gdybyś nie była taka drażliwa.
english: I'd call you more often if you weren't so touchy.
glossary: to be touchy/to call sb
translation: I'd have called you more often if you hadn't been touchy.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Gdyby nasza firma chciała być przyjazna dla środowiska, przestałaby przeprowadzać testy na zwierzętach.
english: If our company wanted to be environment-friendly, it would stop conducting tests on animals.
glossary: a company/to be environment-friendly/to conduct tests on animals
translation: If I our company wanted to be enviroment friendly, it would stop conduct the tests on animal.

name: Anna Patton
polish: O czym przeważnie pisze prasa?
english: What does the press mostly write about?
glossary: the press/to write about sth/mostly
translation: What does the press usually write about?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Spotykam się dzisiaj z jednym z moich klientów, żeby wyjaśnić sytuację.
english: I'm meeting one of my clients today to explain the situation.
glossary: to explain the situation/to meet sb/one of your clients/today
translation: I'm meeting one of my clients to explain the situation.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Będzie cię bolał brzuch, jeśli będziesz dalej jeść tak szybko.
english: You'll have a stomachache if you keep eating so quickly.
glossary: to keep doing sth/to eat quickly/to have a stomachache
translation: Your stomach will hurt if you eat so fast further.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jesteś świetna w wydawaniu pieniędzy.
english: You're great at spending money.
glossary: to be great at sth/to spend money on sth
translation: You're great at spending money.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Kilka tygodni temu siostra przyznała się, że straciła wszystkie oszczędności.
english: My sister admitted a few weeks ago that she'd lost all her savings.
glossary: to lose your savings/to admit that...
translation: My sister admitted a few weeks ago he had lost all her savings.

name: Martina Ruby
polish: Myślę, że odwiedzę cię w weekend, bo jutro wracam późno do domu.
english: I think I'll visit you on the weekend because I'm coming back home late tomorrow.
glossary: to visit sb/to come back home late
translation: 1. I think I will visit you on weekend because I'm coming back home late tomorrow.

name: Martina Ruby
polish: Nie wychodź teraz z domu, bo jest zbyt gorąco.
english: Don't leave the house now because it's too hot.
glossary: to leave the house
translation: 2. Don't leave the house now, it's too hot.

name: Martina Ruby
polish: Zepsułam telefon mojej mamy. Nie wiem, co powinnam teraz zrobić.
english: I broke my mom's cell phone. I don't know what I should do now.
glossary: to break a cell phone
translation: 3. I broke my mom's cell phone. I don't know what I should do now.

name: Martina Ruby
polish: Nie mogę teraz rozmawiać, bo nie mam czasu.
english: I can't talk now because I don't have time.
glossary: to talk to sb
translation: 4. I can't talk now because I don't have time.

name: Martina Ruby
polish: Kiedy wyjeżdżasz?
english: When are you leaving?
glossary: to leave
translation: 5. When are you leaving?

name: Martina Ruby
polish: Mogłem zostać w domu, bo nie ma tu nic do roboty.
english: I could've stayed at home because there's nothing to do here.
glossary: to stay at home/to have nothing to do
translation: 6. I could have stayed at home because it's nothing to do here.

name: Martina Ruby
polish: Gdzie byłeś? Nie mogłem cię znaleźć.
english: Where were you? I couldn't find you.
translation: 7. Where have you been? I couldn't find you.

name: Martina Ruby
polish: Nie zapłaciłam rachunków w zeszłym miesiącu, bo nie miałam żadnych pieniędzy.
english: I didn't pay the bills last month because I didn't have any money.
glossary: to pay the bills
translation: 8. I did't pay my bills last month because I did't have any money.

name: Martina Ruby
polish: Zawsze ci pomogę, bo jesteś siostrą mojej żony.
english: I'll always help you because you're my wife's sister.
glossary: to help sb
translation: 9. I always will help you because you are my wife's sister.

name: Martina Ruby
polish: Byłam pewna, że spędzimy razem więcej czasu.
english: I was sure we'd spend more time together.
glossary: to be sure that.../to spend time with sb
translation: 10. I was sure we would spend more time together.

name: Matt Carpenter
polish: Detektyw pytał się mnie podczas przesłuchania, czy coś widziałem.
english: The detective asked me during questioning if I'd seen anything.
glossary: a detective/during questioning/to see sth
translation: 1. The detective asked mnie durning questoning if I saw something?

name: Matt Carpenter
polish: Znudziło mi się jedzenie codziennie pizzy na obiad.
english: I'm bored with eating a pizza for lunch every day.
glossary: to be bored with sth/to eat a pizza/for lunch/every day
translation: 2. I was bored with eating pizza on lunch everyday.

name: Matt Carpenter
polish: Nie zdołalibyśmy ugasić pożaru, gdybyś od razu nie zadzwonił po służby ratunkowe.
english: We wouldn't have managed to put out the fire if you hadn't immediately called the emergency services.
glossary: to manage to do sth/to put out the fire/to call the emergency services/to immediately do sth
translation: 3. We woudn't put out fire on time if you didn't call the emergency service instant.

name: Matt Carpenter
polish: Gdybyś zawsze dotrzymywał obietnic, dzieci by ci ufały.
english: If you always kept your promises, the kids would trust you.
glossary: to keep your promises/to trust sb
translation: 4.  If you always keep your promises the kids would belive you.

name: Matt Carpenter
polish: Gdybym mówił płynnie po angielsku, wyprowadziłbym się za granicę.
english: If I spoke English fluently, I'd move abroad.
glossary: to speak English fluently/to move abroad
translation: 5. If I speak English fluently I would move abroad.

name: Matt Carpenter
polish: O czym chciałbyś porozmawiać?
english: What would you like to talk about?
glossary: to talk about sth
translation: 6. About what you'd like to talk about?

name: Matt Carpenter
polish: Zgodziłbyś się ze mną, gdybyś był świadomy pewnym faktów.
english: You'd agree with me if you were aware of certain facts.
glossary: to agree with sb/to be aware of sth/certain facts
translation: 7. You'd agree with me if you were awaere some facts.

name: Matt Carpenter
polish: Nie musiałbym teraz odsiadywać, gdyby mój adwokat odwołał się od wyroku.
english: I wouldn't have to do time now if my attorney had appealed the court's decision.
glossary: to do time; to serve a sentence/an attorney/to appeal the court's decision
translation: 8. You don't have take a time if my lawayer appel to the court's decision.

name: Matt Carpenter
polish: Mój klient zażądał, żeby sprawa została oddalona.
english: My client demanded that the case be dismissed.
glossary: to demand that.../to dismiss a case
translation: 9.My lawayer demend the case will dismiss.

name: Matt Carpenter
polish: Nie doprowadzałbyś zawsze ciotki do szaleństwa, gdybyś był cicho.
english: You wouldn't always drive your aunt crazy if you were quiet.
glossary: to drive sb crazy/an aunt/to be quiet
translation: 10. You woudn't drive your aount to crazy if you were silent.

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Zatrudnilibyśmy pana, gdyby miał pan więcej doświadczenia w tym obszarze.
english: We would hire you if you had more experience in this area.
glossary: to hire sb/to have experience in sth
translation: We would’ve hired you if you had had more experience of the….

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Nie będę w stanie się skupić na tym zadaniu, dopóki nie ściszysz muzyki.
english: I won't be able to focus on this task until you turn the music down.
glossary: to focus on sth/ to turn the music down
translation: I won’t be able to focus until you turn down the music.

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Nie będę z tobą rozmawiała, dopóki mnie nie przeprosisz.
english: I will not be speaking with you until you apologize to me.
glossary: to speak with sb/to apologize to sb
translation: I won’t talk to you until you apologize to me.

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Jaką zabawkę chcesz dostać na urodziny?
english: What toy would you like to get for your birthday?
glossary: to get sth for your birthday/a toy
translation: What toy do you want for your birthday?

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Nie zapomniałbyś o spotkaniu, gdybyś dodała je do swojego kalendarza.
english: You wouldn't have forgotten about the meeting if you had added it to your calendar.
glossary: to forget about sth/a meeting/to add sth to your calendar
translation: You wouldn’t have forgot about the meeting if you had added it to your calendar.

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Niełatwo było mi namówić żonę na wzięcie kilku dni wolnego.
english: It wasn't easy for me to persuade my wife to take a few days off.
glossary: to persuade sb to do sth/a day off
translation: It wasn’t easy for me to talk into my wife to take a few days off.

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Nie będziesz grał w żadne gry, dopóki nie posprzątasz.
english: I won't be playing any games until you clean up.
glossary: to play games/to clean sth up
translation: You won’t play any games until you clean up.

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Nie będę taki przepracowany, kiedy skończy się sezon.
english: I won't be this overworked when this season ends.
glossary: to be overworked/to end
translation: I won’t be so overburdend with work when the season will finish.

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Dlaczego nalegasz? Wiesz, że się nie zgodzę.
english: Why are you insisting? You know I won't agree.
glossary: to insist/to agree
translation: Why do you insist? You know I won’t agree.

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Trudno nam będzie to zmierzyć, bo nie mamy odpowiednich narzędzi.
english: It will be hard for us to measure it, because we don't have the right tools.
glossary: to measure sth/to have the right tools
translation: It will be hard for us to …… it because we don’t have the right tools.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Zatrudnilibyśmy pana, gdyby miał pan więcej doświadczenia w tym obszarze.
english: We would hire you if you had more experience in this area.
glossary: to hire sb/to have experience in sth
translation: 1.	We’d hire you if you had more experience in this area.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Nie będę w stanie się skupić na tym zadaniu, dopóki nie ściszysz muzyki.
english: I won't be able to focus on this task until you turn the music down.
glossary: to focus on sth/ to turn the music down
translation: 2.	I wouldn’t be able to focus on the task until you turn down the music.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Nie będę z tobą rozmawiała, dopóki mnie nie przeprosisz.
english: I will not be speaking with you until you apologize to me.
glossary: to speak with sb/to apologize to sb
translation: 3.	I won’t talk with you until you apologize to me.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jaką zabawkę chcesz dostać na urodziny?
english: What toy would you like to get for your birthday?
glossary: to get sth for your birthday/a toy
translation: 4.	What a toy do you want to get for your birthday?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Nie zapomniałbyś o spotkaniu, gdybyś dodała je do swojego kalendarza.
english: You wouldn't have forgotten about the meeting if you had added it to your calendar.
glossary: to forget about sth/a meeting/to add sth to your calendar
translation: 5.	You wouldn’t have forgotten about the meeting if you had added it in to your calendar.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Niełatwo było mi namówić żonę na wzięcie kilku dni wolnego.
english: It wasn't easy for me to persuade my wife to take a few days off.
glossary: to persuade sb to do sth/a day off
translation: 6.	It wasn’t easy for me to talk my wife into taking a few days off.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Nie będziesz grał w żadne gry, dopóki nie posprzątasz.
english: I won't be playing any games until you clean up.
glossary: to play games/to clean sth up
translation: 7.	You won’t play any games until you clean up.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Nie będę taki przepracowany, kiedy skończy się sezon.
english: I won't be this overworked when this season ends.
glossary: to be overworked/to end
translation: 8.	I won’t be so overworked when the season is finished.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Dlaczego nalegasz? Wiesz, że się nie zgodzę.
english: Why are you insisting? You know I won't agree.
glossary: to insist/to agree
translation: 9.	Why are you insisting on? You know that I won’t agree.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Trudno nam będzie to zmierzyć, bo nie mamy odpowiednich narzędzi.
english: It will be hard for us to measure it, because we don't have the right tools.
glossary: to measure sth/to have the right tools
translation: 10.	It’ll be hard for us to measure it because we don’t have the appropriate tools.

name: Adrianne Nelson
polish: Jutro uczę się na egzamin, ale możemy się spotkać, jak już skończę.
english: I'm studying for an exam tomorrow, but we can meet once I'm done.
glossary: to be done/to study for an exam/to meet sb
translation: I’m  studying to exam tomorrow but we can meet up once I finish.

name: Adrianne Nelson
polish: Nie pojechałem nad jezioro, bo obawiałem się, że się przeziębię.
english: I didn't go to the lake because I was afraid I'd catch a cold.
glossary: to go to the lake/to catch a cold/to be afraid of sth
translation: I didn’t go to the lake because I was afraid that, I would catch a cold

name: Adrianne Nelson
polish: Przeprowadzę się, jak już znajdę nową pracę.
english: I'll move once I find a new job.
glossary: to move/to find a new job
translation: I’ll move once I find  a new job.

name: Adrianne Nelson
polish: Będę mieć więcej energii, jak już napiję się kawy.
english: I'll have more energy once I have some coffee.
glossary: to have energy/to have some coffee
translation: I’ll have more energy once I drink a coffee.

name: Adrianne Nelson
polish: Poproszę o podwyżkę, jak już szef będzie z powrotem w biurze.
english: I'll ask for a pay-raise once my boss is back in the office.
glossary: to ask for a pay-raise/to be back in the office
translation: I’ll ask for a raise once my boss be back in the office.

name: Adrianne Nelson
polish: Jestem podekscytowana, bo jutro widzę się ze starą znajomą.
english: I'm excited because I'm seeing an old friend of mine tomorrow.
glossary: to see sb/to be excited
translation: I’m exciting because I’m meeting with my old friend tomorrow.

name: Adrianne Nelson
polish: W przyszłym tygodniu zaczynam kurs angielskiego. Nie mogę się doczekać.
english: I'm starting an English course next week. I can't wait.
glossary: can't wait/to start an English course
translation: We’re starting an English cours next week. I can’t wait.

name: Adrianne Nelson
polish: Porozmawiamy, jak już będziesz gotowa.
english: We'll talk once you're ready.
glossary: to talk to sb/to be ready
translation: We’ll talk once you be ready.

name: Adrianne Nelson
polish: Bałem się, że przegramy sprawę przez mój błąd.
english: I was afraid we'd lose the case because of my mistake.
glossary: to be afraid of sth/to lose a case/because of you/a mistake
translation: I was afraid that we would lose a case of my mistake.

name: Adrianne Nelson
polish: Możemy przełożyć nasze spotkanie? Jutro przyjeżdżają moi rodzice w odwiedziny.
english: Can we put off our meeting? My parents are visiting me tomorrow.
glossary: to visit sb/to put off a meeting
translation: We can postpone our meeting? My parents are coming in visit tomorrow.

name: Alexandra King
polish: Przygotuję się na spotkanie, jeśli będę mieć czas.
english: I'll get prepared for the meeting if I have time.
glossary: to get prepared for a meeting
translation: 1.	I will prepare for the meeting if I would have time

name: Alexandra King
polish: Na twoim miejscu nie chodziłbym spać tak późno.
english: If I were you, I wouldn't go to sleep so late.
glossary: to go to sleep late
translation: 2.	If I were you I wouldn’t go sleep so late.

name: Alexandra King
polish: Gdybyś nie popełnił tego przestępstwa, policja by cię teraz nie szukała.
english: If you hadn't committed the crime, the police wouldn't be looking for you now.
glossary: to look for sb/to commit a crime
translation: 3.	If you hadn't committed this crime, the police wouldn't be looking for you now.

name: Alexandra King
polish: O czym musimy porozmawiać?
english: What do we have to talk about?
glossary: to talk about sth
translation: 4.	About what we should talk?

name: Alexandra King
polish: Dlaczego jest tyle głosów przeciwko temu kandydatowi?
english: Why are there so many votes against the candidate?
glossary: a vote against sb/a candidate
translation: 5.	Why are there so many votes against this candidate?

name: Alexandra King
polish: Kogo spotkałeś, kiedy wychodziłeś z budynku?
english: Who did you meet when you were leaving the building?
glossary: to meet sb/to leave the building
translation: 6.	Who did you meet when you were leaving the building?

name: Alexandra King
polish: Zrobiłaś test ciążowy?
english: Did you do a pregnancy test?
glossary: to do a pregnancy test/a pregnancy test
translation: 7.	Did you do a pregnancy test?

name: Alexandra King
polish: Dowiedziałem się wczoraj, że mój szef pracował wcześniej w agencji nieruchomości.
english: I found out yesterday that my boss had worked at a real estate agency before.
glossary: a real estate agency/to find out that.../a boss
translation: 8.	I found out yesterday that my boss worked in a real estate agency earlier.

name: Alexandra King
polish: Wszyscy się mnie wczoraj pytali, czy jestem zły. Nie wiem dlaczego.
english: Everybody asked me yesterday if I was mad. I don't know why.
glossary: to be mad at sb
translation: 9.	Everybody asked me if I was angry yesterday. I don’t know why.

name: Alexandra King
polish: Często podróżowaliśmy z mężem, zanim urodziło się nasze pierwsze dziecko.
english: My husband and I had often traveled before our first kid was born.
glossary: to be born/a kid/to travel/a husband
translation: 10.	We were often travelling before our first child was born.

name: Anette Gray
polish: Na czym jesteś taki skupiony?
english: What are you so focused on?
glossary: to focus on sth
translation: What are you focusing on?

name: Anette Gray
polish: Nie byłbyś wrakiem, gdybyś nie ćpał przez ostatni rok.
english: You wouldn't be a wreck if you hadn't done drugs for the past year.
glossary: to be a wreck/to do drugs/for the past year
translation: You wouldn't have been … if you didn't get drugs during the last year.

name: Anette Gray
polish: Przygotuj się na wstawanie wcześnie rano.
english: Get prepared for getting up early in the morning.
glossary: to get prepared for sth/tp get up early
translation: Get prepared for getting up in the morning early.

name: Anette Gray
polish: Mój chłopak się mnie pytał, dlaczego go okłamałam.
english: My boyfriend asked me why I'd lied to him.
glossary: a boyfriend/to lie to sb
translation: My boyfriend asked me why I lied to him.

name: Anette Gray
polish: Gdyby ludzie na co dzień dbali o środowisko, wiele gatunków by nie wymarło.
english: If people took care of the environment on a daily basis, many species wouldn't have died out.
glossary: to take care of the environment/the environment/on a daily basis/a species/to die out
translation: If people take care about envarioment a lot of … wouldn’t died.

name: Anette Gray
polish: Zamówiłbym teraz frytki, gdybym nie był najedzony.
english: I'd order French fries now if I weren't full.
glossary: to order French fries/to be full
translation: I would’ve ordered French fries now if I weren’t full.

name: Anette Gray
polish: Uważasz, że obywatele mieliby coś przeciwko, gdyby premier ustąpił ze stanowiska?
english: Do you think citizens would mind if the prime minister stepped down?
glossary: a citizen/to mind/the prime minister/to step down
translation: Are you considering people mind if the prime dismis his position?

name: Anette Gray
polish: Żądamy, aby prezes został pociągnięty do odpowiedzialności.
english: We demand that the president be held responsible.
glossary: to demand that.../the president {2}/to be held responsible
translation: We demand the CEO will take the responsibility.

name: Anette Gray
polish: Gdybyś umiał czytać między wierszami, wiedziałbyś, co twoja dziewczyna ma na myśli.
english: If you could read between the lines, you'd know what your girlfriend meant.
glossary: to read between the lines/to mean sth/a girlfriend
translation: If you know how to read …. you would know what your girlfriend means.

name: Anette Gray
polish: Nie dostałbyś mandatu, gdybyś nie przekroczył dozwolonej prędkości.
english: You wouldn't have gotten a ticket if you hadn't been speeding.
glossary: to get a ticket/to be speeding
translation: You wouldn’t have gotten a ticket if you hadn’t … the speed.

name: Adam Dollar
polish: Pojadę na wakacje, jak już oszczędzę pieniądze.
english: I'll go on vacation once I save some money.
glossary: to go on vacation/to save some money
translation: I will go on vacation once I save money.

name: Adam Dollar
polish: Dam Ci znać, jak już skończę pracę.
english: I'll let you know once I finish work.
glossary: to let sb know/to finish work
translation: I will let you know once I finish work.

name: Adam Dollar
polish: Muszę iść wcześnie spać, bo jutro robię prezentację.
english: I have to go to sleep early because I'm giving a presentation tomorrow.
glossary: to go to sleep early/to give a presentation
translation: I have to go sleep early, becauce I’m making a presentation tomorrow.

name: Adam Dollar
polish: Myślałem, że będziesz tęsknić za domem.
english: I thought you'd feel homesick.
glossary: to feel homesick
translation: I thought you would feel homesick..

name: Adam Dollar
polish: Zadzwonię do ciebie, jak już będę w domu.
english: I'll call you once I'm at home.
glossary: to call sb/to be at home
translation: I will call you once I’m at home.

name: Adam Dollar
polish: Wyjeżdżam jutro z miasta. Zadzwonię do ciebie, jak już wrócę.
english: I'm leaving town tomorrow. I'll call you once I'm back.
glossary: once/to leave town/to call sb
translation: I’m leaving town tomorrow. I’ll call you once I come back.

name: Adam Dollar
polish: Mogłem się nauczyć na test.
english: I could've studied for the test.
glossary: to study for a test
translation: I could study for a test.

name: Adam Dollar
polish: Odwiozę cię do domu, jak już zjemy kolację.
english: I'll take you home once we eat dinner.
glossary: to take sb home/to eat dinner
translation: I’ll give you a ride home once we eat a dinner.

name: Adam Dollar
polish: Oglądamy dzisiaj wieczorem mecz. Wpadnij.
english: We're watching a match tonight. Drop by.
glossary: to watch a match/to drop by
translation: We are watching the match tonight. You drop by.

name: Adam Dollar
polish: Co powiesz na poniedziałek? W weekend zajmuję się psami mojej siostry.
english: What about Monday? I'm taking care of my sister's dogs on the weekend.
glossary: on the weekend/What about.../to take care of sth
translation: What about monday? On the weekend I’m taking care of my sister’s dogs.

name: Martin Vance
polish: Kogo chcesz, żebym zaprosił na imprezę?
english: Who do you want me to invite to the party?
glossary: to invite sb to a party
translation: Who do you want me to invite to the party?

name: Martin Vance
polish: Z kim wczoraj poszedłeś na imprezę?
english: Who did you go to the party with yesterday?
glossary: to go to a party with sb
translation: Drop by. My husband is cooking this Friday.

name: Martin Vance
polish: Nie powinnaś była składać obietnicy, jeśli wiedziałaś, że jej nie dotrzymasz.
english: You shouldn't have made the promise if you knew you wouldn't keep it.
glossary: to make a promise/to keep a promise
translation: There is no difference. Take what you want.

name: Martin Vance
polish: Jestem rozczarowana. Byłam pewna, że nie złamiesz obietnicy.
english: I'm disappointed. I was sure you wouldn't break the promise.
glossary: to be disappointed with sth/to be sure/to break a promise
translation: You could tell me the truth right away. I wouldn't be upset.

name: Martin Vance
polish: Ufam ci, bo od dawna razem pracujemy.
english: I trust you because we've been working together for a long time.
glossary: to trust sb/for a long time
translation: What did you want to tell me at the party?

name: Martin Vance
polish: Możemy porozmawiać, bo nie ma tu nikogo.
english: We can talk because there's nobody here.
glossary: to talk about sth
translation: There is a mistake in the article. Correct it.

name: Martin Vance
polish: Przeprowadzam się w przyszłym miesiącu na wieś. Nie mogę się doczekać.
english: I'm moving to the countryside next month. I can't wait.
glossary: can't wait/to move to the countryside
translation: Maybe I will take a cab. I will save my time.

name: Martin Vance
polish: Jest kilka książek, które chciałbym przeczytać do końca roku.
english: There are a few books I'd like to read by the end of the year.
glossary: a few/to read a book/by the end of the year
translation: What do you want to get for your birthday?

name: Martin Vance
polish: Mam nadzieję, że zdążę na pociąg. To ostatni.
english: I hope I'll catch the train. It's the last one.
glossary: to catch the train/to catch the last train
translation: Where did you sleep yesterday?

name: Martin Vance
polish: Od miesiąca szukam pracy, ale nie ma interesujących ofert.
english: I've been looking for a job for a month, but there are no interesting offers.
glossary: to look for a job/an offer
translation: I was stressed out because I was afraid that something would go wrong.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Kiedy brałem prysznic, wpadłem na świetny pomysł.
english: When I was taking a shower, I came up with a great idea.
glossary: to take a shower/to come up with sth/to come up with an idea
translation: When I was taking a shower, I got an amazing idea.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Przeziębisz się, jeśli nie założysz czapki.
english: You'll catch a cold if you don't put on a cap.
glossary: to put on a cap/to catch a cold
translation: You'll catch a cold if you don't put on a cap.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Żona się mnie pytała kilka dni temu, czy kiedykolwiek ją zdradziłem.
english: My wife asked me the other day if I'd ever cheated on her.
glossary: a wife/the other day/to cheat on sb
translation: My wife asked me a few days ago if I had ever cheated on her.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Gdybyś nie był zapominalski, cały zespół nie musiałby teraz pracować.
english: If you weren't forgetful, the whole team wouldn't have to work now.
glossary: to be forgetful/the whole team/to work
translation: If you hadn't be forgetful, our team wouldn't work now.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Mój klient zażądał, żeby sprawa została oddalona.
english: My client demanded that the case be dismissed.
glossary: to demand that.../to dismiss a case
translation: My client demanded his case would be dismissed.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jechałeś bardzo szybko. Bałem się, że będziemy mieli wypadek.
english: You drove very fast. I was afraid we'd have an accident.
glossary: to drive/to be afraid/to have an accident
translation: You drove so fast. I was afraid, we'd have an accident.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Rzuciłbym pracę, gdybym musiał pracować po godzinach.
english: I'd leave my job if I had to work overtime.
glossary: to leave your job/to work overtime
translation: I'd leave my job if I had to work overtime.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Co mi chciałaś powiedzieć na imprezie?
english: What did you want to tell me at the party?
glossary: to tell sb sth/at the party
translation: What did you want to tell me at the party?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Mam dość tego projektu, bo pracuję nad nim od kilku miesięcy.
english: I'm fed up with the project because I've been working on it for a few months.
glossary: to be fed up with sth/to work on a project
translation: I'm fed up with the project because I've been working on it for a few months.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Zerwałabym z tobą, gdybyś mnie zdradził.
english: I'd break up with you if you cheated on me.
glossary: to cheat on sb/to break up with sb
translation: I'd break up with you if you had cheat on me.

name: Alexandra Lee
polish: Nie będziesz musiała mnie odbierać jutro ze szkoły, bo śpię u koleżanki.
english: You won't have to pick me up from school tomorrow because I'm sleeping at my friend's.
glossary: to pick sb up from school/to sleep at your friend's
translation: 1. You won't have to pick me up from the school tomorrow, because I'm sleeping in my colleague.

name: Alexandra Lee
polish: Myślałem, że zjemy dzisiaj na mieście.
english: I thought we'd eat out today.
glossary: to eat out
translation: 2. I thought we would eat out today.

name: Alexandra Lee
polish: Mogłem wczoraj wydać mniej pieniędzy.
english: I could've spent less money yesterday.
glossary: to spend money on sth
translation: 3. I could spent less money yesterday.

name: Alexandra Lee
polish: Nie ma nikogo w domu. Dlatego jest tak cicho.
english: There's no one at home. That's why it's so silent.
glossary: to be at home/to be silent
translation: 4. There're nobody at home. That's why it's so quite.

name: Alexandra Lee
polish: Nie wiem, co powinienem odpowiedzieć.
english: I don't know what I should answer.
glossary: to answer a question
translation: 5. I don't know what I should answer.

name: Alexandra Lee
polish: Byłem pewny, że zrobisz swoją pracę domową.
english: I was sure you'd do your homework.
glossary: to do your homework
translation: 6. I was sure, you would do your homework.

name: Alexandra Lee
polish: W zeszłym roku nie pojechałem na wakacje, ponieważ nie miałem pieniędzy.
english: I didn't go on vacation last year because I didn't have any money.
glossary: to go on vacation/to have no money
translation: 7. Last year I didn't go on vacation because I didn't have money.

name: Alexandra Lee
polish: Zawsze znajdę dla ciebie czas, bo jesteś dla mnie ważna.
english: I'll always find time for you because you're important to me.
glossary: to find time for sb/to be important to sb
translation: 8. I always find time for you because you're important to me.

name: Alexandra Lee
polish: Nie mogę się skupić, gdy jest tak głośno.
english: I can't focus when it's so loud.
glossary: to focus on sth/to be loud
translation: 9. I can't focus when is so loud.

name: Alexandra Lee
polish: Gramy jutro mecz. Dołączysz do nas?
english: We're playing a match tomorrow. Will you join us?
glossary: to play a match/to join sb
translation: 1. We're playing a match tomorrow. You join us?

name: Caroline Bailey
polish: Miałem w zeszłym tygodniu dużo pracy i bałem się, że nie wyrobię się z terminem.
english: I had a lot of work last week and I was afraid I wouldn't meet the deadline.
glossary: to have a lot of work/last week/to be afraid of sth/to meet the deadline
translation: 1.I had a lot of work last week and I was afraid that I would not meet the deadline.

name: Caroline Bailey
polish: Nie powinieneś był wspominać o naszych problemach na spotkaniu z szefem.
english: You shouldn't have mentioned our problems at the meeting with the boss.
glossary: at the meeting/to mention sth
translation: 2. You shouldn't have mentioned our problems during meeting with the boss.

name: Caroline Bailey
polish: Przyjeżdżam jutro do Warszawy i zatrzymuję się u mojej koleżanki.
english: I'm coming to Warsaw tomorrow and staying at my friend's.
glossary: to come to Warsaw
translation: 3. I am coming to Warsaw tomorrow and staying with my friend.

name: Caroline Bailey
polish: Nie powinieneś był opowiadać tego żartu. Był niegrzeczny.
english: You shouldn't have told the joke. It was rude.
glossary: to be rude to sb/to tell sb a joke
translation: 4. You shouldn't have told this joke. It was rude.

name: Caroline Bailey
polish: Miałem nadzieję, że nic nie będę musiał dzisiaj robić.
english: I hoped I wouldn't have to do anything today.
glossary: to hope/today
translation: 5. I hoped I wouldn't have to do anything today.

name: Caroline Bailey
polish: Powinienem był spędzić zeszły weekend z rodziną.
english: I should've spent my last weekend with my family.
glossary: to spend time with sb/last weekend/a family
translation: 6. I should have spent last weekend with my family.

name: Caroline Bailey
polish: Nie powinienem był Ci opowiadać tej historii, bo jest zbyt prywatna.
english: I shouldn't have told you the story because it's too private.
glossary: to tell sb a story/to be private
translation: 7. I shouldn't have told you this story because it's too private.

name: Caroline Bailey
polish: Miałem nadzieję, że ci klienci zostawią większy napiwek.
english: I hoped the customers would leave a bigger tip.
glossary: to leave a tip/a customer/to hope
translation: 8. I was hoping these customers would leave a higher tip.

name: Caroline Bailey
polish: Nie powinieneś był mnie okłamywać.
english: You shouldn't have lied to me.
glossary: to lie to sb
translation: 9. You shouldn't have lied to me.

name: Caroline Bailey
polish: Co robisz dziś wieczorem?
english: What are you doing tonight?
translation: 10. What are you doing tonight?

name: Martin Hale
polish: Zatrudnilibyśmy pana, gdyby miał pan więcej doświadczenia w tym obszarze.
english: We would hire you if you had more experience in this area.
glossary: to hire sb/to have experience in sth
translation: 1. We would hire you if you had more experience in this area.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Nie będę w stanie się skupić na tym zadaniu, dopóki nie ściszysz muzyki.
english: I won't be able to focus on this task until you turn the music down.
glossary: to focus on sth/ to turn the music down
translation: 2. I won't be able to focus on the task until you turn down the music.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Nie będę z tobą rozmawiała, dopóki mnie nie przeprosisz.
english: I will not be speaking with you until you apologize to me.
glossary: to speak with sb/to apologize to sb
translation: 3. I won't speak with you until you apologize to me.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Jaką zabawkę chcesz dostać na urodziny?
english: What toy would you like to get for your birthday?
glossary: to get sth for your birthday/a toy
translation: 4. What a toy do you want to get for your birthday?

name: Martin Hale
polish: Nie zapomniałbyś o spotkaniu, gdybyś dodała je do swojego kalendarza.
english: You wouldn't have forgotten about the meeting if you had added it to your calendar.
glossary: to forget about sth/a meeting/to add sth to your calendar
translation: 5. You wouldn't have forgotten about the meeting if you had added it to your calendar.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Niełatwo było mi namówić żonę na wzięcie kilku dni wolnego.
english: It wasn't easy for me to persuade my wife to take a few days off.
glossary: to persuade sb to do sth/a day off
translation: 6. It wasn’t easy for me to persuade my wife to take a few days off.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Nie będziesz grał w żadne gry, dopóki nie posprzątasz.
english: I won't be playing any games until you clean up.
glossary: to play games/to clean sth up
translation: 7. You won’t play in any games until you clean up.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Nie będę taki przepracowany, kiedy skończy się sezon.
english: I won't be this overworked when this season ends.
glossary: to be overworked/to end
translation: 8. I won’t be so overworked when the season is over.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Dlaczego nalegasz? Wiesz, że się nie zgodzę.
english: Why are you insisting? You know I won't agree.
glossary: to insist/to agree
translation: 9. Why are you insisting? You know, I won’t agree.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Trudno nam będzie to zmierzyć, bo nie mamy odpowiednich narzędzi.
english: It will be hard for us to measure it, because we don't have the right tools.
glossary: to measure sth/to have the right tools
translation: 10. It will be hard for us to take measurements because we don’t have the right tools.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Co twoi byli koledzy z pracy powiedzieliby o Tobie, gdyby nie było cię w pokoju?
english: What would your former colleagues say about you if you weren’t in the room?
glossary: a former colleague/to be in the room
translation: 1.	What would your colleagues tell about you if you weren’t in the room?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jak opisałbyś swój styl pracy?
english: How would you describe your work style?
glossary: to describe sth
translation: 2.	How would you describe your work style?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jak wyznaczasz cele? Przedstaw w skrócie proces.
english: How do you set goals? Outline the process.
glossary: to set your goals/to outline sth/a process
translation: 3.	How do you set the goals? Put forward the process shortly.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jaka jest Twoja największa słabość?
english: What is your greatest weakness?
glossary: your greatest weakness
translation: 4.	What’s your the biggest weakness?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Co robisz w swoim wolnym czasie?
english: What do you do in your spare time?
glossary: your spare time
translation: 5.	What do you do in your free time?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Kto był Twoim ulubionym menedżerem?
english: Who was your favorite manager?
glossary: a manager
translation: 6.	Who was your favorite manager?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Opowiedz mi o sobie.
english: Tell me about yourself.
glossary: to tell sb sth
translation: 7.	Tell me about yourself.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jaka jest ostatnia książka, którą przeczytałeś?
english: What's the last book you read?
glossary: to read sth
translation: 8.	What’s the last book you read?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Z jakim typem osobowości najlepiej pracujesz?
english: What kind of personality do you work best with?
glossary: to work best with sb
translation: 9.	What personality type do you work best with?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Co motywuje Cię do pracy?
english: What motivates you to work?
glossary: to motivate sb/to work
translation: 10.	What motivates you to work?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jaka jest najtrudniejsza decyzja, którą podjąłeś w ciągu ostatnich dwóch lat?
english: What's the most difficult decision you've made in the past two years?
glossary: to make a decision
translation: 1.	What’s the most difficult decision you’ve made in the last two years?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jaka jest najważniejsza rzecz, której nauczyłeś się w szkole?
english: What's the most important thing you learned in school?
glossary: to learn sth in school/the most important thing
translation: 2.	What’s the most important thing you learned at school?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Co jest Twoją największą mocną stroną?
english: What is your greatest strength?
glossary: your greatest strength
translation: 3.	What’s your biggest strength?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jaka jest Twoja największa porażka?
english: What is your greatest failure?
glossary: your greatest failure
translation: 4.	What’s your biggest failure?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jakie jest Twoje największe osiągnięcie poza pracą?
english: What is your greatest achievement outside of work?
glossary: your greatest achievement
translation: 5.	What’s your biggest achievement out of work?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jakie były obowiązki na Twoim ostatnim stanowisku?
english: What were the responsibilities of your last position?
glossary: your last position
translation: 6.	What responsibilities were in your last position?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Co lubisz robić dla zabawy?
english: What do you like to do for fun?
glossary: to do sth for fun
translation: 7.	What do you like to do for fun?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Co chcesz robić inaczej w swojej następnej roli?
english: What do you want to do differently in your next role?
glossary: to do sth differently
translation: 8.	What do you want to do differently in your next role?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Co lubisz robić?
english: What do you like to do?
glossary: to like to do sth
translation: 9.	What do you like to do?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jak przygotowywałeś się do tego wywiadu?
english: How did you prepare for this interview?
glossary: to prepare sb for sth
translation: 10.	How did you prepare for the interview?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Nie będziesz zadowolona, kiedy przeczytasz tę wiadomość.
english: You won't be happy when you read the message.
glossary: to be happy/to read a message
translation: 1.	You won’t be happy when you read the message.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Gdzie planujecie jechać tym razem?
english: Where are you planning to go this time?
glossary: to plan to go somewhere
translation: 2.	Where do you plan to go this time?

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Widzę, że trudno ci utrzymać kontakt wzrokowy.
english: I see that it's hard for you to keep eye contact.
glossary: to keep eye contact
translation: 3.	I see that it’s hard for you to keep the eye contact.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Gdybym ja tu rządziła, mielibyśmy rozsądne godziny pracy.
english: If I ruled here, we would have more reasonable working hours.
glossary: to rule/to be reasonable/working hours
translation: 4.	If I reined here, we’d have reasonable working hours.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Wasze akcje marketingowe będą bardziej wydajne, kiedy zrozumiecie swoją grupę docelową.
english: Your marketing actions will be more efficient when you understand your target audience.
glossary: to be efficient/marketing actions/a target audience
translation: 5.	Your marketing stock will be more efficient when you understand your target group.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Jakiego rozwiązania szukasz? Może będę w stanie ci pomóc.
english: What solution are you looking for? Maybe I'll be able to help.
glossary: a solution for sth/to be able to help
translation: 6.	What solution are you looking for? Maybe I’ll be able to help you.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Łatwo ci to mówić, bo nie masz dzieci.
english: It's easy for you to say this because you don't have kids.
glossary: to have kids
translation: 7.	It’s easy for you to say it because you don’t have kids.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Nie musiałbym tu teraz siedzieć, gdybym złożył wypowiedzenie na koniec miesiąca.
english: I wouldn't have to sit here now if I had given my notice at the end of the month.
glossary: to sit/to give notice
translation: 8.	I wouldn’t have to sit here now if I’d given my notice at the end of the month.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Niełatwo nam zrobić wrażenie na naszej szefowej.
english: It's not easy for us to make a good impression on our boss.
glossary: to make a good impression on sb/a boss
translation: 9.	It’s not easy for us to impress our boss.

name: Adam Hunt
polish: Kiedy będziesz mieć czas, wytłumaczysz mi, jak to działa?
english: When you have time, will you explain to me how it works?
glossary: to explain sth to sb
translation: 10.	Will you explain me how it works when you have time?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Gdybym mówił płynnie po angielsku, wyprowadziłbym się za granicę.
english: If I spoke English fluently, I'd move abroad.
glossary: to speak English fluently/to move abroad
translation: If I spoke English fluently, I'd move abroad.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jeszcze nie potwierdziłem spotkania.
english: I haven't confirmed the meeting yet.
glossary: to confirm a meeting
translation: I haven't confirmed the meeting yet.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Dobilibyśmy targu, gdybyś się nie odezwał.
english: We would've closed the deal if you hadn't spoken up.
glossary: to speak up/to close a deal
translation: We'd close the deal if you hadn't speak up.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Doktor nie odpowiedział, gdy go wczoraj zapytałam, czy zbadał już pacjentkę.
english: The doctor didn't answer when I asked him yesterday if he'd examined the patient yet.
glossary: a doctor/to answer a question/to examine a patient
translation: The doctor didn't answer when I asked him yesterday if he had already examined his patient.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie pracuję jutro, więc możemy jechać nad jezioro.
english: I'm not working tomorrow, so we can go to the lake.
glossary: to work/to go to the lake/tomorrow
translation: I'm not working tomorrow so we can go to the lake.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Trzymałbym się pierwotnego planu, gdyby sprawy nie wymknęły się spod kontroli.
english: I would've stuck to the initial plan if the things hadn't gotten out of control.
glossary: to stick to the plan/the initial plan/to get out of control
translation: I'd sticked to the plan if cases hadn't gotten out of control.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Czy jest coś, co powinienem szczegółowo omówić?
english: Is there anything I should elaborate on?
glossary: to elaborate on sth
translation: Is it anything what I should discuss in detail?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie spaliłam jeszcze twoich rzeczy, ale za chwilę to zrobię.
english: I haven't burned your stuff yet, but I'll do it in a moment.
glossary: to burn sth/your stuff/in a moment
translation: I haven't burned your staff yet, but I do it in a moment.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Przeprowadzę się, jak już znajdę nową pracę.
english: I'll move once I find a new job.
glossary: to move/to find a new job
translation: I'll move out once I find a new job.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jeśli zostanie przyznany mi ten kredyt, w końcu będę mógł przeprowadzić badanie.
english: If I'm granted the loan, I'll be finally able to conduct the study.
glossary: to be granted a loan/to be able to do sth/to conduct a study/finally
translation: If I'm granted a loan, I'd be able to conduct the a study.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Profesor pytał się mnie kilka dni temu, czy napisałem już wypracowanie.
english: The professor asked me the other day if I'd written the essay yet.
glossary: a professor/the other day/to write an essay
translation: The professor asked me a few days ago if I had already written the essay.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Miałem nadzieję, że żona będzie w dobrym humorze.
english: I hoped my wife would be in a good mood.
glossary: to hope/a wife/to be in a good mood
translation: I hoped my wife would be in a good mood.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Dobrze się wczoraj bawiłaś ze znajomymi?
english: Did you have a good time with your friends yesterday?
glossary: to have a good time
translation: Did you have a good time with your friends yesterday?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Powiedziałem mamie, że poszedłem do lekarza, bo chciałem ją uspokoić.
english: I told my mom I'd gone to the doctor because I wanted to calm her down.
glossary: to go to the doctor/to calm sb down
translation: I told my mom I went to the doctor because I wanted to keep her calm.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jutro jedziemy do centrum na zakupy. Chcesz coś?
english: We're going shopping downtown tomorrow. Do you want anything?
glossary: to go shopping/to go downtown
translation: We'll shopping to mall. Do you want something?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie zapłaciłeś mi jeszcze za zajmowanie się twoimi dziećmi.
english: You haven't paid me for taking care of your kids yet.
glossary: to take care of the kids/to pay for sth
translation: You haven't paid me for taking care of your kids yet.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie musiałbym teraz odsiadywać, gdyby mój adwokat odwołał się od wyroku.
english: I wouldn't have to do time now if my attorney had appealed the court's decision.
glossary: to do time; to serve a sentence/an attorney/to appeal the court's decision
translation: I must've been .... now if your attorney had appealed the court's decision.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Kogo powinieneś słuchać? Swoich kolegów czy mnie?
english: Who should you listen to? Your friends or me?
glossary: to listen to sb
translation: Who should you listen to? His friends or me?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Właśnie czytałem o zostawianiu napiwków.
english: I've just read about leaving tips.
glossary: to read about sth/to leave a tip
translation: I've already readen about leaving a tip.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Miałem nadzieję, że wrócę do domu dzisiaj, ale uciekł mi pociąg.
english: I hoped I'd come back home today, but I missed the train.
glossary: to hope/to come back home/today/to miss the train
translation: I hoped I came back home yesterday, but I missed a train.

name: Camille Tyner
polish: Pojadę na wakacje, jak już oszczędzę pieniądze.
english: I'll go on vacation once I save some money.
glossary: to go on vacation/to save some money
translation: I will go on vacation once I safe money

name: Camille Tyner
polish: Dam Ci znać, jak już skończę pracę.
english: I'll let you know once I finish work.
glossary: to let sb know/to finish work
translation: I will let you know once I finish my job

name: Camille Tyner
polish: Muszę iść wcześnie spać, bo jutro robię prezentację.
english: I have to go to sleep early because I'm giving a presentation tomorrow.
glossary: to go to sleep early/to give a presentation
translation: I have to go sleep early because I am giving a presentation tomorrow

name: Camille Tyner
polish: Myślałem, że będziesz tęsknić za domem.
english: I thought you'd feel homesick.
glossary: to feel homesick
translation: I thought you would miss home

name: Camille Tyner
polish: Zadzwonię do ciebie, jak już będę w domu.
english: I'll call you once I'm at home.
glossary: to call sb/to be at home
translation: I will call you once I am home

name: Camille Tyner
polish: Wyjeżdżam jutro z miasta. Zadzwonię do ciebie, jak już wrócę.
english: I'm leaving town tomorrow. I'll call you once I'm back.
glossary: once/to leave town/to call sb
translation: I am leaving town tomorrow. I will call you when I get back

name: Camille Tyner
polish: Mogłem się nauczyć na test.
english: I could've studied for the test.
glossary: to study for a test
translation: I should have learned for this test.

name: Camille Tyner
polish: Odwiozę cię do domu, jak już zjemy kolację.
english: I'll take you home once we eat dinner.
glossary: to take sb home/to eat dinner
translation: I will take you home once we eat dinner

name: Camille Tyner
polish: Oglądamy dzisiaj wieczorem mecz. Wpadnij.
english: We're watching a match tonight. Drop by.
glossary: to watch a match/to drop by
translation: We are watching a match tonight. Drop in

name: Camille Tyner
polish: Co powiesz na poniedziałek? W weekend zajmuję się psami mojej siostry.
english: What about Monday? I'm taking care of my sister's dogs on the weekend.
glossary: on the weekend/What about.../to take care of sth
translation: What about Monday? I am taking care of my sister’s dogs on the weekend.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Do kogo się uśmiechasz?
english: Who are you smiling at?
glossary: to smile at sb
translation: Who are you laughing?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Gdybyś mnie posłuchał, nie skończyłbyś w szpitalu.
english: If you'd listened to me, you wouldn't have ended up in the hospital.
glossary: to listen to sb/to end up in the hospital
translation: If you had listened to me, you wouldn't ended up in the hospital.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Mój chłopak się mnie pytał, dlaczego go okłamałam.
english: My boyfriend asked me why I'd lied to him.
glossary: a boyfriend/to lie to sb
translation: My boyfriend aked me why I had cheaten on him.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Następny weekend spędzam w moim rodzinnym mieście.
english: I'm spending next weekend in my hometown.
glossary: in your hometown/to spend next weekend
translation: I'm spending the next weekend in my home town.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Ufam ci, bo od dawna razem pracujemy.
english: I trust you because we've been working together for a long time.
glossary: to trust sb/for a long time
translation: I trust you because we've been working together for a long time.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Przeprowadzam się w przyszłym miesiącu na wieś. Nie mogę się doczekać.
english: I'm moving to the countryside next month. I can't wait.
glossary: can't wait/to move to the countryside
translation: I'm moving to the coutryside next moth. I can't wait.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Mam nadzieję, że zdążę na pociąg. To ostatni.
english: I hope I'll catch the train. It's the last one.
glossary: to catch the train/to catch the last train
translation: I hope I'll catch the train. It's the last.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Powinienem był spędzić zeszły weekend z rodziną.
english: I should've spent my last weekend with my family.
glossary: to spend time with sb/last weekend/a family
translation: I should've spent last week with my family.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Mój kumpel jest beznadziejny w podrywaniu kobiet.
english: A friend of mine is terrible at picking up women.
glossary: a friend of yours/a friend of mine/to be terrible at sth/to pick up women
translation: My friend is terrible at picking up women.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie wychodź teraz z domu, bo jest zbyt gorąco.
english: Don't leave the house now because it's too hot.
glossary: to leave the house
translation: Don't leave the house now because it's too hot.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Do czego odnosi się artykuł?
english: What does the article refer to?
glossary: to refer to sth/an article
translation: What does the article reffer to?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jest jeszcze kilka wiadomości, na które muszę odpowiedzieć.
english: There are still a few messages I have to reply to.
glossary: to reply to a message
translation: There is a few more messanges I have to reply to.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Gdzie jedziesz w tym roku na wakacje?
english: Where are you going on vacation this year?
glossary: to go on vacation/this year
translation: Where are you going on vacation this year?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Zmarnowałem godzinę, czekając na ciebie na zewnątrz.
english: I wasted an hour waiting for you outside.
glossary: to waste your time/to wait for sb/outside
translation: I wasted an hour on waiting for you outside.

name: Anna Patton
polish: O co walczysz?
english: What are you fighting for?
glossary: to fight for sth
translation: What are you fighting for?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Moje życie się zmieniło po tym, jak zostałem zwolniony.
english: My life changed after I'd gotten fired.
glossary: a life/to change/to get fired
translation: My life changed after I had been fired.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Za co chciałbyś mnie przeprosić?
english: What would you like to apologize to me for?
glossary: to apologize to sb for sth
translation: What do you want to apologize to me for?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie ma różnicy. Bierz, co chcesz.
english: There's no difference. Take what you want.
glossary: a difference/to take sth
translation: There's no difference. Take what you want.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Interesuję się gotowaniem.
english: I'm interested in cooking.
glossary: to be interested in sth/to cook sth
translation: I'm interested in cooking.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Mogłem napisać ten test z angielskiego w zeszłym tygodniu. Teraz nic nie pamiętam.
english: I could've taken the English test last week. I don't remember anything now.
glossary: to take an English test/to remember sth/last week
translation: I could've written the English test last week. I don't remember anything now.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie miałbym nic przeciwko, gdybyś wyraziła swoje zdanie.
english: I wouldn't mind if you expressed your opinion.

polish: Mogłem wczoraj wydać mniej pieniędzy.

name: Maddie Ivy

polish: Aplikowałem już na kilka stanowisk, ale nikt jeszcze do mnie nie zadzwonił.

english: We would've saved money if we'd booked the tickets in advance.

english: Is there anything I should know before making the call?
glossary: to make a call/to know sth

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie byłbyś teraz spłukany, gdybyś nie imprezował w zeszły weekend.
english: You wouldn't be broke now if you hadn't partied last weekend.
glossary: to be broke/to party/last weekend
translation: You woudn’t be broken up now if you hadn’t party last week.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Wyjeżdżam jutro z miasta. Zadzwonię do ciebie, jak już wrócę.
english: I'm leaving town tomorrow. I'll call you once I'm back.
glossary: once/to leave town/to call sb
translation: I’m leaving town tomorrow. I’ll call you once I come back.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Przygotuj się na wstawanie wcześnie rano.
english: Get prepared for getting up early in the morning.
glossary: to get prepared for sth/tp get up early
translation: Let’s prepare for getting up early in the morning.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jutro jem obiad z moim szefem.
english: I'm having lunch with my boss tomorrow.
glossary: to have lunch with sb/a boss
translation: I’m eating lunch with my boss tomorrow.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie byłbyś teraz przepracowany, gdybyś odpoczywał w weekendy.
english: You wouldn't be overworked now if you took a rest on weekends.
glossary: to be overworked/to take a rest/on weekends
translation: You wouldn’t be overworked now if you’d take a rest on weekends.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Dostałbym w zeszłym roku stypendium, gdybym miał lepsze oceny.
english: I would've gotten a scholarship last year if I'd had better grades.
glossary: to get a scholarship/to have good grades
translation: I would’ve gotten a scholarship last year if I’d had better grades.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie mogę się skupić, gdy jest tak głośno.
english: I can't focus when it's so loud.
glossary: to focus on sth/to be loud
translation: I can’t focus when it’s so loud.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Dlaczego jeszcze nie dostałem podwyżki?
english: Why haven't I gotten a pay-raise yet?
glossary: to get a pay-raise
translation: Why haven’t I gotten a pay-raise yet?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jest jeszcze tyle rzeczy, których muszę się nauczyć na test.
english: There are still so many things I have to study for the test.
glossary: to study sth for a test
translation: There are still s omany thngs I have to study for a test.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Dzięki za upieczenie ciasta na moją imprezę urodzinową.
english: Thanks for baking the cake for my birthday party.
glossary: to bake a cake/Thanks for sth/a birthday party
translation: Thanks for baking cake to my birthday party.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie odkryłem jeszcze swojego powołania.
english: I haven't found my vocation yet.
glossary: to find your vocation
translation: I haven’t discovered my vocation yet.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie powinieneś był mnie okłamywać.
english: You shouldn't have lied to me.
glossary: to lie to sb
translation: You should’ve cheaten on me.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Wszyscy się mnie wczoraj pytali, czy jestem zły. Nie wiem dlaczego.
english: Everybody asked me yesterday if I was mad. I don't know why.
glossary: to be mad at sb
translation: Everyone asked me yesterday why I was mad. I don’t know why.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie chowałbym wobec ciebie teraz urazy, gdybyś mnie nie ośmieszyła wczoraj przy znajomych.
english: I wouldn't hold the grudge now if you hadn't ridiculed me in front of my friends yesterday.
glossary: to hold a grudge against sb/to ridicule sb/in front of your friends
translation: I wouldn’t hold a grudge agaist you now if you hadn’t  laugh at me in front of my friends yesterday.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie powinniśmy byli się kłócić. To nie miało sensu.
english: We shouldn't have argued. It didn't make sense.
glossary: to argue with sb/to make sense
translation: We should’ve ha dan argument. It didn’t make sense.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Muszę iść wcześnie spać, bo jutro robię prezentację.
english: I have to go to sleep early because I'm giving a presentation tomorrow.
glossary: to go to sleep early/to give a presentation
translation: I need to go to bed early because I make a presentation tomorrow.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie powinieneś był tyle pić na imprezie.
english: You shouldn't have drunk so much at the party.
glossary: to drink/at the party
translation: You shouldn’t drink so much at the party.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jeden z moich uczniów powiedział mi wczoraj, że pies zjadł mu pracę domową.
english: One of my students told me yesterday that his dog had eaten his homework.
glossary: a dog/to do your homework
translation: One of my students told me yesterday his dog had eaten his homework.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Znudziło mi się jedzenie codziennie pizzy na obiad.
english: I'm bored with eating a pizza for lunch every day.
glossary: to be bored with sth/to eat a pizza/for lunch/every day
translation: I’m bored with eating pizza for lunch every day.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Gdybyś zawsze dotrzymywał obietnic, dzieci by ci ufały.
english: If you always kept your promises, the kids would trust you.
glossary: to keep your promises/to trust sb
translation: If you had ever keep you promises, children would trust you.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Byłbym wdzięczny, gdybyś wyświadczyła mi przysługę.
english: I'd be grateful if you did me a favor.
glossary: I'd be grateful if.../to be grateful/to do sb a favor
translation: I’d be grateful if you did me a favor.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Na co czekasz?
english: What are you waiting for?
glossary: to wait for sb
translation: What are you waiting for?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Policja nie zatrzymałaby cię, gdybyś włączył światła.
english: The police wouldn't have pulled you over if you'd turned on the headlights.
glossary: to turn on the headlights/to pull sb over/the police
translation: The police woudn’t detain you if you had turn on the lights.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Będziesz miał szlaban, jeśli nie wrócisz na czas do domu.
english: You'll be grounded if you don't come back home on time.
glossary: on time/to come back home/to be grounded
translation: You would be grounded if you didn’t come back home on time.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Gdzie byłaś? Byłem pewien, że pojawisz się dzisiaj na spotkaniu.
english: Where were you? I was sure you'd show up at the meeting today.
glossary: to be sure/to show up at the meeting/today
translation: Where have you been? I was sure you would show up at the meeting today.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Gdybym w zeszłym roku więcej trenowała, byłabym teraz w formie.
english: If I'd worked out more last year, I'd be in shape now.
glossary: to work out/to be in shape
translation: If I had trained more last year, I would be in shape now.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Może bym ci uwierzyła, gdybyś miał dowody.
english: Maybe I'd believe you if you had evidence.
glossary: to have evidence/to believe sb
translation: Maybe I’ll believe you if you have a proof.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie bolałyby cię plecy, gdybyś nie siedział codziennie przed telewizorem.
english: You wouldn't have back pain if you didn't sit in front of the TV every day.
glossary: to have back pain/to sit in front of the TV/every day
translation: You wouldn't have a back pain if you hadn't sit in front of TV every day.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Często podróżowaliśmy z mężem, zanim urodziło się nasze pierwsze dziecko.
english: My husband and I had often traveled before our first kid was born.
glossary: to be born/a kid/to travel/a husband
translation: We traveled often with my husband before our first child borned.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Co powiesz na poniedziałek? W weekend zajmuję się psami mojej siostry.
english: What about Monday? I'm taking care of my sister's dogs on the weekend.
glossary: on the weekend/What about.../to take care of sth
translation: What about Monday? I take care of my sister's dog on the weekend.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Powinienem był od razu cię zwolnić. Nie zasługujesz, żeby tu być.
english: I should've fired you right away. You don't deserve to be here.
glossary: to fire sb/right away/to deserve sth
translation: I should've fired you right now. You don't deserve to be here.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Dlaczego skłamałeś, gdy cię kilka dni temu pytałam, czy spałeś z moją kumpelą?
english: Why did you lie when I asked you the other day if you'd slept with my friend?
glossary: to lie to sb/the other day/to sleep with sb
translation: Why did you lie when I asked you a few days ago if you had slept with my friend?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Skup się na sprzątaniu pokoju.
english: Focus on cleaning the room.
glossary: to focus on sth/to clean a room
translation: Focus on cleaning the room.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Ciotka się mnie pytała, czy skończyłam już studia.
english: My aunt asked me if I'd graduated from college yet.
glossary: an aunt/to graduate from college
translation: My aunt asked me if I graduated in studies.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Dlaczego tak zareagowałaś? Możesz mi to wytłumaczyć?
english: Why did you react like that? Can you explain it to me?
glossary: to react to sth/like that/to explain sth to sb
translation: Why did you react like that? Can you expalin it to me?

name: Anna Patton
polish: W pewnym momencie wierzyłem, że wrócimy do siebie.
english: At some point, I believed we'd get back together.
glossary: At some point.../to get back together

name: Anna Patton
polish: Będzie mi przykro, jeśli ze mną nie zatańczysz.

glossary: to dance with sb/to be sorry
translation: I'll be sorry if you won't dance with me.

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Klient dodzwoniłby się do nas, gdyby szefowa uaktualniła nasze dane kontaktowe.
english: The client would have called us back if boss had updated our contact details.
glossary: a client/to call sb back/a boss/to update contact details

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Co twoi rodzice próbują wskórać?
english: What are your parents trying to accomplish?
glossary: to try to accomplish sth

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Na szczęście łatwo było ofierze zidentyfikować napastnika.
english: Luckily, it was easy for the victim to identify the assaulter.
glossary: to identify sb/an assaulter
translation: Fortunately, it was easy for victim ……….. a ………….

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Byłbyś bardziej zaangażowany w swoje obowiązki, gdybyś był na prowizji.
english: You'd be more engaged in your duties if you were on commission.
glossary: to be engaged in sth/to be on commission

name: Agnes Chapman
polish: Trudno ci będzie zaangażować wszystkich w rozmowę.
