polish: Dam ci znać, jak już skończę pracę. Będziemy w kontakcie.
english: I'll let you know once I finish work. We'll be in touch.
glossary: to let sb know/to finish work/to be in touch
translation: 1. I’ll let you know when I finish my job. We’ll stay in touch.

name: Chris Mayer
polish: Mam dość tego projektu, bo pracuję nad nim od kilku miesięcy.
english: I'm fed up with the project because I've been working on it for a few months.
glossary: to be fed up with sth/to work on a project
translation: 2. I’m fed up with this project because I’ve been working on it for a few months.

name: Chris Mayer
polish: Ostrzegałam cię, że będzie korek na autostradzie, ale nie chciałeś mnie słuchać.
english: I warned you there would be a traffic jam on the highway, but you didn't want to listen to me.
glossary: to warn sb that.../I've warned you that.../an accident/on the highway/to listen to sb
translation: 3. I warned you that there would be a traffic jam on the highway, but you wouldn’t listened to me.

name: Chris Mayer
polish: Myślę, że będziemy częściej wychodzić razem na miasto, bo przyszłym miesiącu przeprowadzam się do Warszawy.
english: I think we'll hang out together more often because I'm moving to Warsaw next month.
glossary: to go out; to hang out/to move to Warsaw/next month
translation: 4. I think we’re going to go out together more often because I’m moving to Warsaw next month.

name: Chris Mayer
polish: Nie powinnam była na ciebie krzyczeć. Musiałeś czuć się rozczarowany.
english: I shouldn't have shouted at you. You must've felt disappointed.
glossary: to scream at sb; to shout at sb/to feel disappointed
translation: 5. I shouldn’t have shouted at you. You must have felt disappointed.

name: Chris Mayer
polish: Przez trzy miesiące w liceum pracowałam jako kelnerka.
english: I worked as a waitress for three months in high school.
glossary: to work as a waitress/in high school
translation: 6. I’ve worked as a waitress in high school for three months.

name: Chris Mayer
polish: W pewnym momencie wierzyłem, że wrócimy do siebie.
english: At some point, I believed we'd get back together.
glossary: At some point.../to get back together
translation: 7. At some point I believed we would get back together.

name: Chris Mayer
polish: Jakie problemy są w twojej firmie?
english: What problems are there in your company?
glossary: a problem; an issue
translation: 8. What kind of problems are there in your company?

name: Chris Mayer
polish: O kim rozmawiacie?
english: Who are you talking about?
glossary: to talk about sb
translation: 9. Who are you talking about?

name: Chris Mayer
polish: Gdzie zostawiłeś kurtkę?
english: Where did you leave your jacket?
glossary: a jacket/to leave sth
translation: 10. Where did you leave the jacket?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Od czego to zależy?
english: What does it depend on?
glossary: to depend on sth
translation: What does it depend on?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie dostanę tej premii, jeśli nie wyrobię się w terminie.
english: I won't get the bonus if I don't meet the deadline.
glossary: to get a bonus/to meet a deadline
translation: I won't get the pay raise if I don't met the deadline.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Czy są jacyś inny ochotnicy?
english: Are there any other volunteers?
glossary: a volunteer
translation: Are there any other volunteers?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Zerwałabym z tobą, gdybyś mnie zdradził.
english: I'd break up with you if you cheated on me.
glossary: to cheat on sb/to break up with sb
translation: I would've broken up with you if you had cheaten on me.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie mogłem wczoraj spać, bo wypiłem filiżankę kawy przed pójściem do łóżka.
english: I couldn't sleep yesterday because I'd drunk a cup of coffee before going to bed.
glossary: to sleep/to go to bed/to drink a cup of coffee
translation: I couldn't sleep yesterday because I drunk a cup of coffee before going to bed.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Kilka tygodni temu siostra przyznała się, że straciła wszystkie oszczędności.
english: My sister admitted a few weeks ago that she'd lost all her savings.
glossary: to lose your savings/to admit that...
translation: My sister admitted a few weeks ago that she'd lost all her savings.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Kiedy zwróciła pani produkt?
english: When did you return the product?
glossary: to return a product
translation: When do you return the product?

name: Anna Patton
polish: Jeszcze nie zabrałem się do pracy.
english: I haven't gotten down to work yet.
glossary: to get down to work
translation: I haven't gotten down to work yet.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie spóźniłbym się do pracy, gdybym nie utknął w korku.
english: I wouldn't have been late for work if I hadn't gotten stuck in a traffic jam.
glossary: to get stuck in a traffic jam/to be late for work
translation: I wouldn't have been late to work if I hadn't gotten stuck in a traffic jam.

name: Anna Patton
polish: Nie zapłaciłeś mi jeszcze za zajmowanie się twoimi dziećmi.
english: You haven't paid me for taking care of your kids yet.
glossary: to take care of the kids/to pay for sth
translation: You haven't paid me for taking care of yours children yet.

name: Margaret Morgan
polish: Klient dodzwoniłby się do nas, gdyby szefowa uaktualniła nasze dane kontaktowe.
english: The client would've called us back if boss had updated our contact details.
glossary: a client/to call sb back/a boss/to update contact details
translation: The client would have called us if our boss had updated our contact details.

name: Margaret Morgan
polish: Co twoi rodzice próbują wskórać?
english: What are your parents trying to accomplish?
glossary: to try to accomplish sth
translation: What are your parents trying to accomplish?

name: Margaret Morgan
polish: Na szczęście łatwo było ofierze zidentyfikować napastnika.
english: Luckily, it was easy for the victim to identify the assaulter.
glossary: to identify sb/an assaulter
translation: Fortunately, it was easy for victim to identify an assaulter.

name: Margaret Morgan
polish: Byłbyś bardziej zaangażowany w swoje obowiązki, gdybyś był na prowizji.
english: You'd be more engaged in your duties if you were on commission.
glossary: to be engaged in sth/to be on commission
translation: You would be more engaged in your duties if you were on commission.

name: Margaret Morgan
polish: Trudno ci będzie zaangażować wszystkich w rozmowę.
english: It'll be hard for you to engage everybody in the conversation.
glossary: to engage sb in the conversation
translation: It will be hard to engage everyone in the conversation.

name: Margaret Morgan
polish: Kto mnie zastąpi, kiedy wezmę tydzień wolnego?
english: Who's going to replace me when I take a week off?
glossary: to replace sb/to take a week off
translation: Who will cover for me  when I take one week off?

name: Margaret Morgan
polish: Będzie późno, kiedy dojedziemy do domu.
english: It'll be late when we get home.
glossary: to be late/to drive back home
translation: It will be late when we get home.

name: Margaret Morgan
polish: Trudno mi wyciągnąć moje dziecko z łóżka.
english: It's hard for me to get my child out of bed.
glossary: to get your child out of bed
translation: It is hard to take my kid out of bed.

name: Margaret Morgan
polish: Jakie teksty zazwyczaj musisz tłumaczyć?
english: What texts do you usually have to translate?
glossary: to translate a text
translation: What texts do you usually need to translate?

name: Margaret Morgan
polish: Trudno mi się przeprasza za swoje błędy.
english: It's hard for me to apologize for my mistakes.
glossary: to apologize for your mistakes
translation: It's hard for me to apologize for my mistakes.

name: Monica Grimm
polish: Masz zapalniczkę?
english: Do you have a lighter?
glossary: a lighter
translation: 1. Do you have a lighter?

name: Monica Grimm
polish: Rozważasz inne możliwości?
english: Are you considering other options?
glossary: to consider other options
translation: 2. Do you consider other possibilities?

name: Monica Grimm
polish: Obiecuję, że jutro oddam ci pieniądze.
english: I promise I'll give the money back to you tomorrow.
glossary: to give sb back the money; to give the money back to sb
translation: 3. I promise, I'll give your money back tomorrow.

name: Monica Grimm
polish: Dużo podróżowałem, kiedy byłem młodszy.
english: I traveled a lot when I was younger.
glossary: to travel/to be young/...when I was younger
translation: 4. I have traveled a lot when I was younger.

name: Monica Grimm
polish: Kiedy trafiłeś do szpitala?
english: When did you end up in the hospital?
glossary: to end up in the hospital
translation: 5. When did you end up in the hospital?

name: Monica Grimm
polish: Pracujesz jutro z domu czy musisz iść do biura?
english: Are you working from home tomorrow or do you have to go to the office?
glossary: to work from home/to go to the office
translation: 6.Will you work from home or you have to go to work tomorrow?

name: Monica Grimm
polish: Od razu zadzwoniłam na policję, kiedy zauważyłam złodzieja.
english: I immediately called the police when I noticed the thief.
glossary: immediately/to call the police/to notice sth/a thief
translation: 7. I have called to the police immediately when I noticed a thiew

name: Monica Grimm
polish: Rozstaliśmy się rok temu, a ja wciąż jestem zdruzgotany.
english: We broke up a year ago and I'm still depressed.
glossary: to break up/last year/to be depressed/still
translation: 8. We broke up a year ago and I'm still devastated.

name: Monica Grimm
polish: Nie ma nic do jedzenia. Pójdziesz do sklepu?
english: There's nothing to eat. Will you go to the store?
glossary: sth to eat/to go to the store
translation: 9 There's nothing to eat. Will you go to the store?

name: Monica Grimm
polish: Z kim dzisiaj wychodzisz na miasto? Znam tych ludzi?
english: Who are you going out today with? Do I know those people?
glossary: to go out/to know sb
translation: 10. Which whom you going out today? I know these people?

name: Dorothy Slone
polish: Mam nadzieję, że omówimy twoje zachowanie.
english: I hope we'll discuss your behavior.
glossary: to discuss sth/behavior
translation: 1.	I hope we’ll discuss your behavior.

name: Dorothy Slone
polish: Zajmuję się jutro młodszym bratem. Spotkajmy się w weekend.
english: I'm taking care of my younger brother tomorrow. Let's meet on the weekend.
glossary: to meet sb/on the weekend/to take care of sb/a younger brother
translation: 2.	I’m taking care of my younger brother tomorrow. Let’s meet on the weekend.

name: Dorothy Slone
polish: Są rodzice, którzy pozwalają swoim dzieciom palić.
english: There are parents who let their kids smoke.
glossary: to smoke/a kid/to let sb do sth/a parent
translation: 3.	There are parents who allow their kids to smoke.

name: Dorothy Slone
polish: Zrobiłeś wczoraj kopię zapasową plików?
english: Did you back up the files yesterday?
glossary: to back up files
translation: 4.	Did you make back up your files yesterday?

name: Dorothy Slone
polish: Dlaczego powinienem cię posłuchać?
english: Why should I listen to you?
glossary: to listen to sb
translation: 5.	Why I should listen to you?

name: Dorothy Slone
polish: Będę zmęczona, kiedy skończę pracę.
english: I'll be tired when I finish work.
glossary: to finish work/to be tired
translation: 6.	I’ll be tired when I finish work.

name: Dorothy Slone
polish: Od zbyt dawna udajesz szczęśliwego.
english: You've been pretending to be happy for too long.
glossary: to pretend to be happy/for too long
translation: 7.	You've been pretending to be happy for too long.

name: Dorothy Slone
polish: Byłam pewna, że wyjaśnimy sytuację.
english: I was sure we'd explain the situation.
glossary: to explain the situation
translation: 8.	I was sure we would explain the situation.

name: Dorothy Slone
polish: Musimy się lepiej poznać.
english: We have to get to know each other better.
glossary: to get to know each other better
translation: 9.	We have to know each other better.

name: Dorothy Slone
polish: Mam nadzieję, że będziesz spędzał ze mną więcej czasu.
english: I hope you'll spend more time with me.
glossary: to spend time with sb
translation: 10.	I hope you’ll spend more time with me.

name: Eve Miles
polish: Nie miałbyś teraz problemów, gdybyś nie stracił panowania nad sobą.
english: You wouldn't be in trouble now if you hadn't lost your temper.
glossary: to lose your temper/to be in trouble
translation: 1. You wouldn't have any problems now if you hadn't lost your temper.

name: Eve Miles
polish: Dlaczego winisz mnie za utratę pracy?
english: Why are you blaming me for losing your job?
glossary: to lose your job
translation: 2. Why do you blame me for losing your job?

name: Eve Miles
polish: O czym rozmawialiście, kiedy byłam w łazience?
english: What did you talk about when I was in the bathroom?
glossary: to talk about sth/in the bathroom
translation: 3. What did you talk about when I was in the bathroom?

name: Eve Miles
polish: Niestety mój szef został zwolniony, zanim zdążył mi dać podwyżkę.
english: Unfortunately, my boss had been fired before he managed to give me a pay-raise.
glossary: to give sb a pay-raise/a boss/to be fired/Unfortunately...
translation: 4. Unfortunately, my boss was fired before he could give me a pay-raise.

name: Eve Miles
polish: Nie miałbym nic przeciwko, gdybyś wyraziła swoje zdanie.
english: I wouldn't mind if you expressed your opinion.
glossary: to mind/to express your opinion
translation: 5. I wouldn't have anything against it if you expressed your opinion.

name: Eve Miles
polish: Jeden z moich pracowników poinformował mnie wczoraj, że trafił do szpitala.
english: One of my employees informed me yesterday that he'd ended up in the hospital.
glossary: to end up in the hospital/to inform sb
translation: 6. One of my employees informed me yesterday that he ended up in the hospital.

name: Eve Miles
polish: Czy jest osoba w twoim życiu, na której możesz polegać?
english: Is there a person in your life you can rely on?
glossary: to rely on sb
translation: 7. Is there a person in your life you can rely on?

name: Eve Miles
polish: Ile produktów jest na magazynie?
english: How many products are there in stock?
glossary: a product/in stock
translation: 8. How many products are there in stock?

name: Eve Miles
polish: Nigdy nie wziąłem łapówki.
english: I've never taken a bribe.
glossary: to take a bribe
translation: 9. I have never taken a bribe.

name: Eve Miles
polish: Stracisz prawo jazdy, jeśli będziesz prowadzić po pijaku.
english: You'll lose your driver's license if you drive drunk.
glossary: to lose your driver's license/to drive drunk
translation: 10. You will lose your driving license if you drive drunk.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Fabryka rozpcznie produkcje, jak już zarząd na to pozwoli.
english: The factory will go ahead with the production once the board allows it.
glossary: to allow sth/to go ahead with the production/a factory/the board
translation: 1. The factory will start production once the manager board allows it.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Zawsze chcesz, żeby wszyscy ci współczuli.
english: You always want everyone to feel for you.
glossary: to feel for sb
translation: 2. You always want everyone to feel sorry for you.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Dopiłeś już swoją kawę do końca?
english: Have you drunk up your coffee yet?
glossary: to drink up your coffee
translation: 3. Have you drunken up your coffee to the end?

name: Martin Hale
polish: Mój lekarz rodzinny obiecał, że wciśnie mnie w grafik.
english: My GP promised he'd fit me in to his schedule.
glossary: to fit sb in to your schedule/a GP
translation: 4. My GP promised me that he will fit me in the schedule.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Zapisujesz to? Nie mam zamiaru się powtarzać.
english: Are you taking it down? I'm not going to repeat myself.
glossary: to repeat yourself/to write sth down; to take sth down
translation: 5. Are you writing it down? I don’t want to say it again.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Kiedy pogodziłaś się z rodziną?
english: When did you make up with your family?
glossary: to make up with sb/a family
translation: 6. When did you make up with your family?

name: Martin Hale
polish: Dlaczego twoim zdaniem ten raport wymaga analizy?
english: Why does the report call for an analysis in your opinion?
glossary: to call for an analysis/In my opinion...
translation: 7. Why does the raport demand an analysis in your opinion?

name: Martin Hale
polish: Mogłem podjąć się tej roli. Zarabiałbym teraz więcej.
english: I could've taken on the role. I'd earn more now.
glossary: to make money; to earn money/to take on a role
translation: 8. I might’ve taken on the role. I would earn more now.

name: Martin Hale
polish: W zeszłym miesiącu mi powiedziałaś, że ta praca cię wykańcza.
english: You told me last month that the job was wearing you down
glossary: to wear sb down/a job
translation: 9. You told me last month that this job wore you out.

name: Martin Hale
polish: Jeszcze rok temu bank utrzymywał, że wziąłem tę pożyczkę.
english: Only a year ago, the bank insisted that I'd taken out the loan.
glossary: to take out a loan/to insist that...
translation: 10. The bank claimed only a year ago that I had taken out the loan.

name: Gabriel Ryan
polish: Jutro uczę się na egzamin, ale możemy się spotkać, jak już skończę.
english: I'm studying for an exam tomorrow, but we can meet once I'm done.
glossary: to be done/to study for an exam/to meet sb
translation: 1. I'm studing for my exam tomorrow, but we can meet when I'm will finish.

name: Gabriel Ryan
polish: Nie pojechałem nad jezioro, bo obawiałem się, że się przeziębię.
english: I didn't go to the lake because I was afraid I'd catch a cold.
glossary: to go to the lake/to catch a cold/to be afraid of sth
translation: 2.I didn't go to the lake because I was afraid .....

name: Gabriel Ryan
polish: Przeprowadzę się, jak już znajdę nową pracę.
english: I'll move once I find a new job.
glossary: to move/to find a new job
translation: 3. I will move as soon as I find a new job.

name: Gabriel Ryan
polish: Będę mieć więcej energii, jak już napiję się kawy.
english: I'll have more energy once I have some coffee.
glossary: to have energy/to have some coffee
translation: 4. I will have more energy after drinking coffee.

name: Gabriel Ryan
polish: Poproszę o podwyżkę, jak już szef będzie z powrotem w biurze.
english: I'll ask for a pay-raise once my boss is back in the office.
glossary: to ask for a pay-raise/to be back in the office
translation: 5. I'll ask for a raise once the boss is back in the office.

name: Gabriel Ryan
polish: Jestem podekscytowana, bo jutro widzę się ze starą znajomą.
english: I'm excited because I'm seeing an old friend of mine tomorrow.
glossary: to see sb/to be excited
translation: 6. I'm excited because I'm seeing an old friend tomorrow.

name: Gabriel Ryan
polish: W przyszłym tygodniu zaczynam kurs angielskiego. Nie mogę się doczekać.
english: I'm starting an English course next week. I can't wait.
glossary: can't wait/to start an English course
translation: 7. I'm starting an English course next week. Can't wait.

name: Gabriel Ryan
polish: Porozmawiamy, jak już będziesz gotowa.
english: We'll talk once you're ready.
glossary: to talk to sb/to be ready
translation: 8. We'll talk when you're ready.

name: Gabriel Ryan
polish: Bałem się, że przegramy sprawę przez mój błąd.
english: I was afraid we'd lose the case because of my mistake.
glossary: to be afraid of sth/to lose a case/because of you/a mistake
translation: 9. I was afraid ...

name: Gabriel Ryan
polish: Możemy przełożyć nasze spotkanie? Jutro przyjeżdżają moi rodzice w odwiedziny.
english: Can we put off our meeting? My parents are visiting me tomorrow.
glossary: to visit sb/to put off a meeting
translation: 10. Can we .... our meeting? My parents are coming to visit tomorrow.
